description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

When you use the aid another action to help a creature succeed at a skill check in a skill in which you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.dkDzFtHOTXLnJivf]{Skill Focus} feat, add your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.a65jtTCCb5kXCz5v]{Operative's Edge} to the assisted creatureâ€™s check in addition to the +2 bonus granted by a successful aid another attempt. Creatures observing both you and the creature you assist can attempt a @Check[type:perception] check against a DC equal to 5 + the result of your aid another check to notice if you used the aid another action.
